items.sentence: You can read a lot more than you think you can.
You must eat properly to keep up your strength.
You don't have to work so hard if you're tired.
You have to be more careful when you play ball.
You never appreciated the things I did for you.
Tom began to suspect that Mary would leave him.
I suspect that Tom won't wait very much longer.
I suspect that Tom won't need to do that again.
If I had more money, I'd buy one of those, too.
I have been told that I am pragmatic, and I am.
Tom didn't seem to know very much about Boston.
Make sure all the doors and windows are locked.
Watching the cat sleeping makes me feel better.
If you run into a problem, just give me a call.
Boxes shouldn't be transported completely full.
The police no longer believe Tom murdered Mary.
Tom really wanted to believe Mary was innocent.
It's hard to believe Tom could murder somebody.
I'm really looking forward to seeing your show.
Tom knew that he couldn't make everybody happy.
